caption.p: Inhibition kinetics of acetylcholinesterase (AChE) activity in the presence of different concentrations of substrate and the inhibitor. The data are presented as graphics of nonlinear (Michaelis–Menten graph) and linear regressions (Lineweaver–Burk plots) in the presence or absence of two concentrations of galantamine (a) and REVERC3 (b).
